title: All my champions ive purchased are gone after not playing for awhile
body:
this is my first time logging in to the game for about 2 years and idk whats exactly happening im currently installing the game as im typing this i logged in and it had me change my name and now i have 0 champions unlocked even tho i know i had alot of them unlocked with money i spent on this game and with points i earned through playing the game. 

so basically is there anyway riot can check my history or something so i can get my stuff i have purchased back im just gonna assume that i dont have my skins i purchased anymore also but i havent really bothered checking that far. 

otherwise im probably not even gonna bother trying play this game again if your stuff you get is taken away for just not playing for awhile.

any help would be appreciated

replies.body: That's pretty eerie to come back, but I wasn't able to see anything that would cause your champs to be removed.  Is there a chance that you may be logging onto the wrong account?  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can look into this with you and know for sure.
